API Collection# Metal enumerations

## [Topics](/documentation/metal/metal-enumerations#topics)

### [Enumerations](/documentation/metal/metal-enumerations#Enumerations)

[`enum Code`](/documentation/metal/mtltensorerror-swift.struct/code)The error codes that Metal can raise when you create a tensor.[`enum MTLArgumentBuffersTier`](/documentation/metal/mtlargumentbufferstier)The values that determine the limits and capabilities of argument buffers.[`enum MTLLogStateError`](/documentation/metal/mtllogstateerror)[`enum MTLMathFloatingPointFunctions`](/documentation/metal/mtlmathfloatingpointfunctions)Indicates which FP32 math functions Metal uses.[`enum MTLMathMode`](/documentation/metal/mtlmathmode)An indication of whether the compiler can perform optimizations for floating-point arithmetic that may violate the IEEE 754 standard.[`enum MTLMatrixLayout`](/documentation/metal/mtlmatrixlayout)[`enum MTLReadWriteTextureTier`](/documentation/metal/mtlreadwritetexturetier)The support level for read-write texture formats.[`enum MTLShaderValidation`](/documentation/metal/mtlshadervalidation)Indicates whether shader validation in an enabled or disabled state, or neither state.[`enum MTLTransformType`](/documentation/metal/mtltransformtype)## [See Also](/documentation/metal/metal-enumerations#see-also)
